definition: curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)

pinyin: ying2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 shi4
ying2 mu4 bao3 hu4 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: The number of seconds to wait before taking the screenshot.
sentences.chinese: 在照下萤幕截图前等待的秒数。

sentences.english: By default, the line-of-site vector is normal to the screen.
sentences.chinese: 依预设，视线向量正垂于萤幕。
那大萤幕电视机怎么办呢？

sentences.english: Content for basic screens must often be paginated to be displayed properly.
sentences.chinese: 基本萤幕内容必须经常重新编页，才能适当的显示。

sentences.english: By contrast, plasmas aren't efficient to make at small-screen sizes.
sentences.chinese: 相反，等离子电视在小萤幕方面显示出不足。

sentences.english: The laptop's screen displayed an array of squiggly lines.
sentences.chinese: 电脑萤幕上出现一条条波行线。

sentences.english: An airplane appears on the radar screen.
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机出现在雷达萤幕上。

sentences.english: In addition to full-screen, the handwriting input method can also use the writing area.
sentences.chinese: 除了全萤幕外，其手写输入法也可使用书写区进行。

sentences.english: If this option is checked, the toolbar will be snapped to the screen border.
sentences.chinese: 如果勾取这个选项，工具列将紧黏在萤幕边缘。

sentences.english: Please check the supplement links at the right side of screen.
sentences.chinese: 请浏灠位于萤幕右方的补充教材连接。

sentences.english: It is equipped with a high-resolution camera, has a slide-out keyboard and a multi-touch screen.
sentences.chinese: 它备有高画素照相机，滑盖式键盘与多触控式萤幕。

sentences.english: Tap a picture on the screen and something happens.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻叩击萤幕上的一张图片，就会看到一些事情发生。
新增卷动到选项萤幕上。

sentences.english: Geordi presses a key, and a logo appears on the computer screen.
sentences.chinese: 鹰眼按了一个键，一个标帜出现在电脑萤幕上。

sentences.english: Moving the mouse should move the cursor on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 移动滑鼠应该会移动萤幕中的游标。
